trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for constructing client-side channels, caching channels, and channel factories.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ChannelManagerService> is responsible for creating a channel for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity> based on the channel token defined in the activity's <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.ChannelToken%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ChannelManagerService"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ChannelManagerService"></xref> class.
Instances of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ChannelManagerService> class are usually created by the runtime using configuration files.
The endpoints defined in the service's constructor will be used to create channels that match the configuration name in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.ChannelToken%2A>.

The endpoints defined in the configuration take precedence over the endpoints defined in code, so if a service endpoint added through code has the same name and contract type as one in the configuration file, then the endpoint defined in code will not be used.
A collection of service endpoints.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ChannelManagerService"></xref> class.
The following parameters are supported:
`idleTimeout`: The maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> that a cached channel can be idle.
`leaseTimeout`: The maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> that a cached channel can be checked out or in use by a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity>.
`maxIdleChannelsPerEndpoint`: The maximum number of idle channels matching a single endpoint that can be cached at any point.
Instances of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ChannelManagerService> class are usually created by the runtime using configuration files.
Configuration parameters for the service.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ChannelManagerService"></xref> class.
Settings for quotas for the pool of channels managed by this service.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ChannelManagerService"></xref> class.
Settings for quotas for the pool of channels managed by this service.
A collection of service endpoints.
